text: FIR No: 221/2024 Date: 12-07-2024 Police Station: Hyderabad Central PS Complainant: Ramesh Kumar, Age 34, Resident of Begumpet. Incident Details: On the night of 11-07-2024 at around 2:30 AM, two unknown individuals broke open an ATM located near Begumpet Metro Station. A white Swift car without a visible number plate was seen in CCTV footage. The suspects used gas cutters to open the ATM cash chest and escaped with approximately â‚¹12,50,000. CCTV shows the suspects wearing black hoodies and gloves. A similar incident was reported last month in Kukatpally area using the same modus operandi. Sections Applied: IPC 379, 427
